title: Govinda - Godoy Cruz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Organic, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegetarian buffet style restaurant featuring a large variety of fresh prepared dishes. Pay for food by weight. No alcohol. Quiet and clean. Daily lunch is from 12-4pm, dinner is from 7:30pm. Refurbished and reopened, Sep 2014.
